t: Request the Closure of Your Account and the Deletion of Your Personal Information - Amazon Customer Service
s: For example, submitting your account closure request through this website will also close your account on amazon.com, amazon.fr, amazon.com.mx, and all other global sites to the extent you use the same credentials to access services and products offered through those sites.

I tried the standard delete from the inventory page. It was still there. Tried it again. Still there. I uploaded a spreadsheet used to delete the item front and back end. No errors once the upload was processed. STILL THERE!

After repeated attempts to deal with the age old problem of brand theft on amazon we have decided to quit Amazon to protect our Brand. We have ended all 1600 listing and we have no current piggy backers on any of our listings. I am registered in amazons brand registry (which is fairly pointless) ...

t: How to Remove Items From Amazon Storefront
s: November 22, 2017 - Click "Close Listing" to remove the item's listing from your storefront. Alternatively, click "Delete Product and Listing" and then click "OK" to remove both the product and its associated information from your inventory. ... How to Add an Amazon Store to WordPress.

t: My brand has been removed by Amazon
s: My brand has been removed by Amazon for nearly three months, during which time I have submitted a POA and passed the brand video review. However, so far Amazon has not restored my brand and deleted a listing under that brand, which has brought great risks and losses to my operations.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: How to remove a brand from Amazon brand Registry
s: November 7, 2022 - It’s important to note that if you remove a brand from the Amazon Brand Registry, you will lose access to the Brand Registry tools and features for that brand and to remove a brand from the Amazon Brand Registry, you will need to follow these steps: Log in to your Amazon Brand Registry account.

t: How to remove a product from Amazon Vendor Central - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 6): It has been a few years since I have used Amazon Vendor Central, but if you no longer wish to carry a product, you may have to reach out to your Vendor Central contact and inform them you no longer wish to carry an item. t: Edit Your Browsing History - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can remove items from your Browsing History, or clear it completely.
